amendment.description: To express the sense of the Senate that Medicaid expansion is a priority and that Obamacare must be improved.

action.text: Amendment SA 288 ruled out of order by the chair.
Motion to waive all applicable budgetary discipline with respect to amendment SA 288 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 10 - 90. Record Vote Number: 172.
Point of order that the amendment violates section 313(b)(1)(A) of the CBA raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 288.
Amendment SA 288 proposed by Senator Enzi for Senator Heller to Amendment SA 267.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 288 proposed by Senator Enzi for Senator Heller to Amendment SA 267.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to waive all applicable budgetary discipline with respect to amendment SA 288 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 10 - 90. Record Vote Number: 172.
